body.description: AAA Floral - Aromas Artesenales de Antigua Triple-Milled Luxury Soap Bar, Enriched with Shea Butter The delicate formulation thoroughly cleanses and moisturizes, leaving fresh and lightly fragranced skin. Our Triple-Milled Luxury Soap Bar is made using Shea butter to heal and protect dry skin, and comes in a variety of flowery fragrances. Inspired by Antigua’s architecture, landscape and fragrances, this decadent, triple-milled luxury soap bar will give you beautifully clean, soft, healthy and subtly scented skin. Available in 7 floral fragrances, Lily of the Valley, Rose Petal, Lavender, Lilac Blossom, Lotus Flower, White Jasmine and Orange Blossom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspired by Antigua’s architecture, landscape and fragrances, our Aromas Artesanales de Antigua Triple-Milled Luxury Soap Bar will enhance your mood and revive your skin. The delicate formulation thoroughly cleanses and moisturizes, leaving fresh and lightly fragranced skin.

AAA Floral - Aromas Artesenales de Antigua Triple-Milled Luxury Soap Bar, Enriched with Shea Butter The delicate formulation thoroughly cleanses and moisturizes, leaving fresh and lightly fragranced skin. Our Triple-Milled Luxury Soap Bar is made using Shea butter to heal and protect dry skin, and comes in a variety of flowery fragrances. Inspired by Antigua’s architecture, landscape and fragrances, this decadent, triple-milled luxury soap bar will give you beautifully clean, soft, healthy and subtly scented skin. Available in 7 floral fragrances, Lily of the Valley, Rose Petal, Lavender, Lilac Blossom, Lotus Flower, White Jasmine and Orange Blossom. ✔️Botanically Active Ingredients ✔️Essential Oils ✔️Enriched with Shea Butter ✔️NOT Tested on Animals ✔️Paraben Free ✔️200 g / 7 oz

The Somerset Toiletry Company Exquisitely Made, Honestly Priced We are dedicated to sourcing the very best quality ingredients to create the perfect fragrances and formulations. We are honest about what ingredients we use and we use natural extracts in our products where possible. Our most popular collections Naturally European, Delray Beach and Tropical Fruits are completely paraben and SLS free. Everything we do is tested in-house as we believe strongly against animal cruelty and as a result we do not sell into China. Each year we introduce new products and review our existing collections based on customer feedback and industry trends. We manufacture products in the UK, Portugal, Belgium, South Africa, Guatemala and China, as we understand budgets vary and this enables us to offer a range of different prices points. We own Serendipity, an excellent manufacturing facility in South Africa which allows us to support the local community. Ultimately, we design, manufacture and distribute products we are proud of and would happily use or give to our loved ones. Design is at the core of our business. Our large team of extremely gifted designers, tirelessly create exquisite packaging for each and every product. Our designs range from traditionally classic to humorously contemporary and consideration goes into each and every detail. We believe our products stand out, they are the whole package; beautiful both inside and out!
AAA Floral - Aromas Artesenales de Antigua Luxury Floral Collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the size of the bar and the scent that stays true to the last sliver. Long lasting. Very satisfied with the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells so good I'm keeping it for my use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Access to a favorite product
reviews.reviewText: Missed this item since BB&B left our area. So glad to find it on Amazon😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely orange blossom scent
reviews.reviewText: This soap has a lovely scent, and good texture. However, the scent wears off after a while, which leaves the last half of the bar a bit... well, scentless! Hence only 4 stars. Still, I love neroli so much that I'll buy again for the first half...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My best scent
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap, it smells divine and leaves my skin feeling soft and not overly dry. It’s expensive and much more expensive than BBB, but with BBB going out of business, this is where I can find it since it’s very hard to find. Still worth it I think, I have it on subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only for those who like medicinal smells
reviews.reviewText: What a disappointment! I so love the smell of orange blossoms having grown them myself, and this bar of soap was not even close. The main scent was a chemical smell that reminds me of the brown antiseptic that used to be used in surgery to clean skin. There was also a faint scent of coal tar which blew off after about 4 days because I didn't have time to throw the bar away...sigh! The bar does come wrapped in lovely paper, which I suppose influenced my purchase, but I hope that my review will help you to not make the same mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells nice and does last a very long time.

So happy to have found this bar soap! I've been searching for a good replacement after Crabtree & Evelyn went under a couple of years ago, and this one has such a lovely rose scent.The soap is moisturizing and doesn't leave my hands feeling dry, though my hands are not quite as soft as when using a luxury soap like Yardley or the old Crabtree products.Also, the soap bar is very large. As others have mentioned, I needed to cut it in half as it was too large to comfortably use for hand washing. Not a big deal - just means it'll last longer.Biggest selling point is the smell - I've tried several rose scents and this one best captures the delicate, floral notes of roses.

reviews.reviewTitle: No huele a lirios del valle, muy decepcionada
reviews.reviewText: No me ha gustado porque no huele a lirios del bosque, recuerda mas el olor a jabón hecho con aceite de oliva que a una buena fragancia de lirios del bosque. No compraré esta marca nunca más.

Lovely scent but there is a brown bit of paper glued on the beautiful packaging which can't be removed. It was also shipped without any protection and thus the packaging looks worn. It is also opened a bit at both sides. Won't be able to give away as a present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This soap is fantastic. Very creamy, strong fragrance and leaves your skin feeling fabulous. The only criticism I have is the size and shape of the bars. Very large (200 grams) and blocky. Not fun when you drop it on your foot in the shower! The blocky shape may be to make production easy but it would be brilliant to have the choice of a smaller size for us pensioners.
